channel.title: How do i make a chest open up like a bank
channel.description:
Ok ive changed my home to castle wars on deltascape and the chest in c wars aint a bank. How can i make it become a bank.
Also how do i change my varrock tele ( home tele ) to c wars

item.title: How do i make a chest open up like a bank
item.dc:creator: @I_kolo_I I kolo I
item.description:
@I_kolo_I wrote:

search into client.java this:

            openUpBank();

you will see something like this:

case 2213: case 2214: case 2566: case 3045: case 5276: case 6084: case 11758: openUpBank(); break;

add to it:

        case (object id):

after it it will looks something like this

case 2213: case 2214: case 2566: case 3045: case 5276: case 6084: case 11758: case 75: openUpBank(); break;

the 75 of " case 75:" is the object id of the chest.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i make a chest open up like a bank
